# Things you should know for the Midterm



## You should understand...


- ...how the new wave of Jihadi groups are similar and different to other armed actors
- ...the three different forms of warfare: conventional, SNC, irregular
- ...how the rate of civil war ocurrence has changed since the Cold War
- ...how the way conflicts are *ending* has changed since the Cold War
- ...what international norms dominated during the Cold War, post-Cold War, and post-9/11 periods
- ...the role of external support in the longevity and probability of success of rebel groups
- ...what the US and Taliban want out of current negotiations in Afghanistan
